metadata.title: CVE-2016-4340 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The impersonate feature in Gitlab 8.7.0, 8.6.0 through 8.6.7, 8.5.0 through8.5.11, 8.4.0 through 8.4.9, 8.3.0 through 8.3.8, and 8.2.0 through 8.2.4allows remote authenticated users to "log in" as any other user viaunspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
